meanings.definition: A holder for a coffee cup.
meanings.sent1: I placed my coffee cup in the zarfs.
meanings.sent2: The zarfs on the table were all different colors.
meanings.sent3: The tiny zarfs danced around the coffee shop.
meanings.sent4: The zarfs embraced the coffee cups like a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: The shiny zarfs sparkled under the café lights.

meanings.sent1: The zarfs on the table matched the decor perfectly.
meanings.sent2: She collected antique zarfs from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The zarfs giggled as they held the cups in place.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of zarfs was a treasure trove of beauty.
meanings.sent5: The delicate zarfs added elegance to the tea party.

meanings.definition: A decorative sleeve for a hot beverage cup.
meanings.sent1: The zarfs kept my hands cool while holding the cup.
meanings.sent2: The café offered reusable zarfs to reduce waste.
meanings.sent3: The zarfs whispered secrets to the cups they adorned.
meanings.sent4: The zarfs were like stylish jackets for the cups.
meanings.sent5: The colorful zarfs brightened up the morning coffee routine.
